text: Stakeholder Consultation – Advancing BECCS in the EU: a Policy Perspective Register Online This is an online event. The European Union's commitment to achieving climate neutrality by 2050 necessitates the deployment of negative emissions technologies, with Bioenergy with Carbon Capture and Storage (BECCS) being a pivotal component. BECCS offers the unique advantage of generating renewable energy while simultaneously removing carbon dioxide from the atmosphere. However, […]
